data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of East Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of East Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of East Garo Hills prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.section_summary: On average, 67 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in East Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, we pray for the believers in East Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: There are 317,900 people living in the county of East Garo Hills. Only about 3,497 might be believers.

Jesus, I pray that all the Koch (Muslim traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Koch (Muslim traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Koch (Muslim traditions) people is yours.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of East Garo Hills.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in East Garo Hills who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to East Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

location.name: East Garo Hills
location.people_groups_list: Bonaj, Hajang, Hajang Banai, Bhunar, Sabar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bonaj (400), Hajang (74,000), Hajang Banai (4,900), Bhunar (200), Sabar (3,900)
